q: The pro-plan union members avoid the streets and meet at an auditorium to listen to their leadership.`` The crisis has been under way for three years,'' the man on the podium says. Many industries are dying, banks are holding on to their money, if nothing improves, unemployment will skyrocket this year. We want to ensure our future. That's why we broke labor unity and approved the Sergio Marchionne plan. The union that's been left alone is the powerful left-leaning metal workers. If its members don't agree to sign, Sergio Marchionne says they will lose their representation rights on the factory floor.

ahead.`` Mr. Donald Rumsfeld 's claim that the abuse at Abu Ghraib was isolated and aberrational is demonstrably false,'' Jameel Jaffer , ACLU's deputy legal director, said in a written statement. Government documents show that the methods used at Abu Ghraib were the same ones Mr. Donald Rumsfeld approved, and that the abuse of prisoners in Defense Department custody was systemic.... This effort to rewrite history is shameful. Donald Rumsfeld 's office is not commenting on the book until its Tuesday release date. We must work together to stop these bills in their tracks, as they represent an unprecedented effort to restrict women's access to reproductive health care and to their trusted health care providers, the Senators said. It makes me jaded and makes me lose faith in humanity some time because I don't understand how people can do that to innocent animals. That comment from Jamie Buehrle carries a direct line to Michael Vick , who was presented with the NFL's Comeback Player of the Year Award this past weekend.
